title: 発見: DMontgomery40/mcp-canvas-lms - Version 2.0 - 37 tools available - an MCP server for interacting with the Canvas
summary: 新しいプロジェクトを発見: Version 2.0 - 37 tools available - an MCP server for interacting with the Canvas LMS API. This server allows you to manage courses, assignments, enrollments, and grades within Canvas. (⭐26 | 🍴10)
content:
Version 2.0 - 37 tools available - an MCP server for interacting with the Canvas LMS API. This server allows you to manage courses, assignments, enrollments, and grades within Canvas.

言語: TypeScript
スター数: 26
フォーク数: 10
